fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater

Class Heater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater.Heater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, HeaterExternalControlI, HeaterInternalControlI, HeaterTemperatureI, HeaterUserI

    public class Heater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements HeaterUserI, HeaterInternalControlI
    The class Heater implements a heater component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       currentState != null
 invariant       targetTemperature != null && targetTemperature.getMeasurementUnit().equals(TEMPERATURE_UNIT)
 invariant       targetTemperature.getData() >= MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData() && targetTemperature.getData() <= MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData()
 invariant       currentPowerLevel == null || currentPowerLevel.getMeasure().getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       currentPowerLevel == null || currentPowerLevel.getMeasure().getData() >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevel.getMeasure().getData() <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL.getData()

    Invariants

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • setCurrentPowerLevel

        public void setCurrentPowerLevel(Measure<java.lang.Double> powerLevel)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: HeaterExternalControlI
        set the power level of the heater; if powerLevel.getData() > getMaxPowerLevel().getData() then set the power level to the maximum.

        Contract

         pre     on()
 pre     powerLevel != null && powerLevel.getData() >= 0.0 && powerLevel.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 post    powerLevel.getData() > getMaxPowerLevel().getData() || getCurrentPowerLevel().getData() == powerLevel.getData()
 post    powerLevel.getData() <= getMaxPowerLevel().getData() || getCurrentPowerLevel().getData() == Heater.MAX_POWER_LEVEL.getData()
        Specified by:
        setCurrentPowerLevel in interface HeaterExternalControlI
        Parameters:
        powerLevel - the powerLevel to be set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
